sentence: (a) In General.--The Secretary of Energy and the       Administrator of the Small Business Administration (in this       section referred to as the ``covered officials'') shall enter       into a memorandum of understanding or other appropriate       agreement to carry out cross-cutting and collaborative       research and development activities focused on the joint       advancement of Department of Energy and Small Business       Administration mission requirements and priorities.
title: Doe and Sba Research Act

sentence: (a) Establishment.--Not later than one year after the date       of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Veterans       Affairs shall hire or designate a Regional Breast Cancer and       Gynecologic Cancer Care Coordinator at each Veteran       Integrated Services Network (hereinafter in this section       referred to as ``VISN'').
title: Women Veterans Cancer Care Coordination Act

sentence:
(a) Establishment.--There is established the Independent       Financial Technology Working Group to Combat Terrorism and       Illicit Financing (in this section referred to as the       ``Working Group''), which shall consist of the following:

(1) The Secretary of the Treasury, acting through the Under       Secretary for Terrorism and Financial Crimes, who shall serve       as the chair of the Working Group.
title: Financial Technology Protection Act of 2025

sentence: ``(a) In General.--The Under Secretary, in collaboration       with the Administrator and research universities and       institutions, shall establish a national-level incubator       program (in this section referred to as the `program') to       increase the number of strategies, technologies, and measures       available to prevent, mitigate, and control harmful algal       blooms.
title: Harmful Algal Bloom and Hypoxia Research and Control Amendments Act of 2025

sentence: ``(a) Establishment.--There shall be within the NTIA an       office to be known as the Office of Policy Development and       Cybersecurity (in this section referred to as the `Office').
title: Ntia Policy and Cybersecurity Coordination Act

sentence:
Veterans experience office

``(a) Establishment.--There is established in the       Department within the Office of the Secretary an office to be       known as the `Veterans Experience Office' (in this section       referred to as the `Office').
title: Protecting Regular Order for Veterans Act of 2025

sentence:
(a) Findings.--Congress finds the following:

(1) The test center within the National Telecommunications       and Information Administration (in this subsection referred       to       as the ``NTIA'') represents executive branch agencies on       spectrum issues before the Federal Communications Commission.
title: Institute for Telecommunication Sciences Codification Act

sentence: ``(a) Establishment.--There is established within the NTIA       an Office of Spectrum Management (in this section referred to       as the `Office').
title: National Telecommunications and Information Administration Reauthorization Act of 2025
